result.eng: I love going to the theatre as well.
result.ga: is aoibhinn liom dul chuig an amharclann freisin

result.eng: When the operation was over, the doctor came out of the operating theatre.
result.ga: nuair a bhí an obráid thart tháinig an dochtúir amach as an obrádlann
